text: @SpeakerPelosi Trump, McConell r in the blame game. His denial of the seriousness of covid19 cost lives. The failure to prepare since Jan falls on Trump. His rally in March was reckless and spread virus. He blamed the Dems for creating fear. Trump can't handle the job.
